ext-sharebar: Name of this extension, only shows in credits
ext-sharebar-desc: Description of this extension, only shows in credits
ext-sharebar-loading: Text to show while loading sharing forms
ext-sharebar-btn-feedback: Button which loads a feedback form
ext-sharebar-share-on: prefix to sharing buttons, which show the logo for each service, so it looks like this: "Share on [facebook logo]"
ext-sharebar-send: Share an article with a friend, through email at the moment
ext-sharebar-service-name-more: Text for the button that displays more sharing options
ext-sharebar-twitter-msg: Template text for sharing on Twitter. $1 is the page's title, $2 is sitename.
ext-sharebar-share-text:
Template text for sharing on services that don't have a customzied text.
$1 is the page's title, $2 is sitename.
